original_text: Those who work with him will all be ashamed. Those workers with special skills are only human. They should come together, and they should stand in front of me. That will make them very frightened. They will realize how foolish they are! Those who work with him will all be ashamed. Those workers with special skills are only human. They should come together, and they should stand in front of me. That will make them very frightened. They will realize how foolish they are! Those who work with him will all be ashamed.
korean_text: 보라 그와 같은 무리들이 다 수치를 당할 것이라 그 대장장이들은 사람일 뿐이라 그들이 다 모여 서서 두려워하며 함께 수치를 당할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Those who work with him will all be ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 일하는 자들은 모두 수치를 당할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Those workers with special skills are only human.
sentences.korean_translation: 특별한 기술을 가진 그 일꾼들은 인간일 뿐이다.

sentences.original_text: and they should stand in front of me.
That will make them very frightened.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들을 매우 무섭게 만들 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will realize how foolish they are!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 얼마나 어리석은지 깨닫게 될 것이다!

sentences.original_text: Those who work with him will all be ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 일하는 자들은 모두 수치를 당할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Those workers with special skills are only human.
sentences.korean_translation: 특별한 기술을 가진 그 일꾼들은 인간일 뿐이다.

sentences.original_text: and they should stand in front of me.
That will make them very frightened.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들을 매우 무섭게 만들 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will realize how foolish they are!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 얼마나 어리석은지 깨닫게 될 것이다!

sentences.original_text: Those who work with him will all be ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 일하는 자들은 모두 수치를 당할 것이다.
